description:
Grippy, affordable and colourful, these pedals tick all the boxes. Made from a nearly indestructible glass reinforced nylon PNW’s new Range pedals perform as well as many alloy pedals on the market, and they leave a little extra money in your pocket for park days. The large platform leaves lots of real estate for your foot to find that sweet-spot of comfort and power transfer. And, 22 user replaceable pins keep you anchored on techie climbs and offer a confidence inspiring connection on the descent.

  • Concave pin layout matched to a convex pedal body for a secure connection that still allows easy repositioning
  • Sealed cartridge and roller bearing for an effortless spin and long-term reliability
  • Big 108 x 115mm platform for efficient power transfer
  • Glass reinforced nylon is super-light and incredibly strong
  • Pedals are fully rebuildable and pins are replaceable
name: PNW Components Range Composite Pedals
